Radio

The radio has the most possible interactions. Six controls enable the user to play and pause, to select the track and control the volume.

Gesture Controls

In front of the device you can control it via gestures. Here is a little help list, which gesture controls what.

  • Play

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

  • Pause

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

  • Next Track

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

  • Previous Track

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

  • Volume Up

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

  • Volume Down

    Open your fist quickly.
    Example

can be found here.
